location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 29: William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra] to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter, received 2 June 1784, informs Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, that a letter has been dispatched to Captain Scott, recommending that he await the arrival at Bushire of the Panther, so that he can benefit from having a convoy to Bussora [Basra].
